files.patch:
@@ -689,1 +689,12 @@
-        var plusReplacedUri = path.toUri().toString().replace("+", "%2b");
+        // For the path which is not encoded by UTF-8, we need to
+        // replace "+" by "%2b" manually before feeding into the decoder.
+        // Otherwise, the URLDecoder would replace "+" by " ", which may
+        // raise NoSuchFileException.
+        //
+        // eg. var path = "file:///jdk-18+9/basic.jar";
+        //     URLDecoder.decode(path, "utf8") -> file:///jdk-18 9/basic.jar
+        //
+        // Also, we should not use URLEncoder in case of the path has been
+        // encoded.
+        var encoded = path.toUri().toString().replace("+", "%2b");
+
@@ -693,1 +704,1 @@
-            new URI("jar", URLDecoder.decode(plusReplacedUri, "utf8"),
+            new URI("jar", URLDecoder.decode(encoded, "utf8"),
